title: My account has been hacked into (it's been 3 days since you guys knew and nothing has been done)
body: i've had to write and reply to countless messages from riot and only just 3 days ago you guys finally understood the problem at hand and now im still waiting for a response :/ i thought you guys would have this on lock and sort it fast. if i could talk to someone from riot on here i might be able to sort it out faster.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and do see that you've got quite a few tickets open on this, which can cause some delay and confusion in responding to you.  It's also important not to reply to the ticket until you receive a response, otherwise it can drop you to the bottom of the queue.  I have confirmed that an account specialist has your ticket now, and will respond asap.  Hang tight!

thanks for the info. what i wanna know tho is how it happened? my info was leaked onto a website full of other peoples accounts, thats not on. how has my info been leaked? my account was verified so i assumed my account was safe but nope.

There could be a number of reasons like account sharing or phishing scams, but I couldn't say for sure in regards to your specific case.  I suggest using our[ account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide for safety practices to help protect your information in and outside of league.  Hope that helps!
yeah i could belive that in the case if i haven't shared my account or even clicked on a link on chat i've only got 1 guy on my friend list and even then we just talk on skype lol
